text: He imandarasakala! Tomaloke yi uparjana karaa arau ami matira paraa tomalokara babe yi utpadana karao tara paraa yito utkrsta seya byaya karaa; arau nikrsta bastu byaya karaara sankalpa nakaraiba, athaca tomaloke nije'i ene bastu caku bandha nakaraa laike grahana nakaraa. Jani thoraa, niscaya allaha abharamukta, saprasansita
